Ammunitions.name: Lightningbone Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Ammunitions.name: Lightningbone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Lightningbone Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Bolt crafted from animal bone with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Lordsworn's Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Well-crafted bolt with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.

Ammunitions.name: Magicbone Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Poisonbone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Poisonbone Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Poisonbone Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison. Craftable item. The addition of fletching enables more precise shots that can travel farther.

Ammunitions.name: Perfumer's Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Bolt created with perfumer techniques. Used by nobles' guards and the like.

Ammunitions.name: Magicbone Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.Craftable item. The Retching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Ammunitions.name: Meteor Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Enchanted work of craft made in tandem with Full Moon Crossbow. The tip is embedded with glintstone.

Ammunitions.name: Magicbone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Radahn's Spear
Ammunitions.description: Greatarrows used by the General Radahns during the festival of combat. These are in fact the many spears with which he was stabbed by the Cleanrot Knights.Imbued with Radahn's gravitational power.

Ammunitions.name: Rainbow Stone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored lights shine at the point of impact.

Ammunitions.name: Rotbone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Rotbone Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

Ammunitions.name: Shattershard Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Ammunitions.name: Serpent Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow carved to resemble a flying snake. Used in tandem with the Serpent Bow.

Ammunitions.name: Shattershard Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrows whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Ammunitions.name: Rotbone Bolt
Ammunitions.description: Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Sleepbone Arrow Fletched
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with drowsiness. Craftable item. The addition of fletching enables more precise shots that can travel farther.

Ammunitions.name: Sleepbone Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with drowsiness. Craftable item.

Ammunitions.name: Spiritflame Arrow
Ammunitions.description: Arrow set alight with ghostflame before firing.Deals magic damage while also afflictingfoes with frost.

Bell%20Bearings.description: The bell bearing of a miner who once dug for smithing stone, found upon his perished flesh. Offer to the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold to gain access to new items.

Whetblades.name: Whetstone Knife
Whetblades.description: Whetstone with a cipher inscription, made to look like a small knifeblade.
Whetblades.effect: Can add new battle arts and affinities to weapons

Whetblades.name: Glintstone Whetblade
Whetblades.description: Glintstone whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
Whetblades.effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

Whetblades.name: Iron Whetblade
Whetblades.description: Iron whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
Whetblades.effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

Whetblades.name: Black Whetblade
Whetblades.description: Black whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
Whetblades.effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

Whetblades.name: Sancrified Whetblade
Whetblades.description: Sanctified whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife. When applying an affinity using physical or golden-type ashes of war, an additional affinity of sacred or lightning can be chosen.
Whetblades.effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon.

Throwing.name: Crystal Dart
Throwing.description: Throwing knife chiseled from impure crystal. Craftable item. Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to deal magic damage. Long ago, it is said that a golem crafter employed a similar crystal tool.
Throwing.effect: Uses FP. Throw to inflict magic damage.

Throwing.name: Poisonbone Dart
Throwing.description: Animal bone sharpened into a knife for throwing, with a poison-laced tip. Craftable item.
Throwing.effect: Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up poison

Throwing.name: Bone Dart
Throwing.description: Animal bone sharpened into a knife for throwing. Craftable item.
Throwing.effect: Throw at enemies to inflict damage

Throwing.name: Fan Daggers
Throwing.description: A set of five throwing knives bundled together.
Throwing.effect: Thrown fanned-out knives at enemies to inflict damage

Throwing.name: Throwing Dagger
Throwing.effect: Throw at enemies to inflict damage

Throwing.name: Explosive Stone
Throwing.description: A small stone with a smoldering core.
Throwing.effect: Explodes when thrown, inflicting Fire Damage

Throwing.name: Gravity Stone Chunk
Throwing.description: Shard of rock found in the wake of a meteorite strike.
Throwing.effect: Uses FP to cause a gravitational explosion

Throwing.name: Gravity Stone Fan
Throwing.description: Shard of rock found in the wake of a meteorite strike.
Throwing.effect: Uses FP to emit fan-shaped gravitational shockwave

Throwing.name: Kukri
Throwing.description: A large knife used for throwing.
Throwing.effect: Throw at enemies to inflict damage and build up onset of blood loss

Throwing.name: Glintstone Scrap
Throwing.description: Piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels. Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt. Poor quality and thereby easily broken, a sorcerer wouldn't give it a second look.
Throwing.effect: Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt.

Throwing.name: Large Glintstone Scrap
Throwing.description: Large piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels.
Throwing.effect: Break gem and use FP to produce many magic bolts

Throwing.name: Cuckoo Glintstone
Throwing.description: Lump of broken glintstone enwreathed with magic power. A "faux sorcery"used by the Knights of the Cuckoo. Craftable item. Launched straight ahead, using FP. A magic bolt springs forth from the point of impact
Throwing.effect: Uses FP to produce a magic bolt

Throwing.name: Poisoned Stone
Throwing.description: A small stone with a poisoned core.
Throwing.effect: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison

Throwing.name: Poisoned Stone Clump
Throwing.description: A clump of small stones with poison cores.
Throwing.effect: Throw together to cause buildup of poison

Throwing.name: Explosive Stone Clump
Throwing.description: A clump of small stones with smoldering cores.
Throwing.effect: Explodes when thrown together, inflicting fire damage

Pots.name: Fetid Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside. As the mixture ferments, toxins are produced alongside a putrid stench that seeps out once ripe. Throw at enemies to cause buildup of deadly poison. Beware though; those who carry these pots will slowly accumulate poison in their own bodies. Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to cause deadly buildup of poison.

Pots.name: Giantsflame Fire Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Enchanted by incantations of the Giants' Flame. Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage. Damage scales with faith.
Pots.effect: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.

Pots.name: Roped Holy Water Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot.
Pots.effect: Uses FP. Throw behind to inflict holy damage

Pots.name: Freezing Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Engraved with the crest of the Carian Royals. Throw at enemies to cause buildup of frost. Originates from the cold, dark moon of Ranni, the Carian princess.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of frost.

Pots.name: Poison Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of poisonous materials is sealed inside. Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of poison.

Pots.name: Oil Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of oil-infused materials is sealed inside. Throw at enemies to soak them in oil, making them heavily susceptible to fire damage.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to soak them in oil.

Pots.name: Roped Oil Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of oil-infused materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot. Throw at rearward enemies to soak them in oil, making them heavily susceptible to fire damage.
Pots.effect: Throw behind to douse enemies in oil

Pots.name: Rancor Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Enchanted by the ancient death hex. Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to spawn vengeful spirits that chase down foes. In times of old, the dead were burned with ghostflame, and from those cinders arose vengeful spirits.
Pots.effect: Uses FP. Throw to summon vengeful spirits.

Pots.name: Cursed-blood Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Decorated with the crest of the Lord of Blood. Throw at enemies to douse them in accursed blood, causing summoned spirits to assail them with a rabid fervor. A childhood memory of the Lord of Blood.
Pots.effect: Throw to douse enemy with accursed blood.

Pots.name: Roped Fetid Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of effluents is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot. Throw at rearward enemies to cause buildup of deadly poison. Beware though; those who carry these pots will slowly accumulate poison in their own bodies. Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.
Pots.effect: Throw behind to cause buildup of deadly poison

Pots.name: Roped Poison Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of poisonous materials is sealed inside, and a short rope that aids throwing has been secured around the pot. Throw at rearward enemies to cause buildup of poison.
Pots.effect: Throw behind to cause buildup of poison

Pots.name: Beastlure Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Enchanted with assassin incantations. Consumes FP. Throw to create a red shadow. The illusion lures in beasts into attacking it. This effect does not change even during combat.

Pots.name: Sacred Order Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order. Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy holy damage. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, even preventing them from rising again. The Golden Order has no mercy for those who trespass beyond life's bounds.
Pots.effect: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy holy damage.

Pots.name: Rot Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot. Decorated with the crest of scarlet wings. Throw at enemies to cause buildup of scarlet rot.  The rot bubbles up from the Swamp of Aeonia, and eats away at life like a vicious plague.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to cause buildup of scarlet rot.

Pots.name: Roped Fire Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
Pots.effect: Throw behind to inflict fire damage.

Pots.name: Holy Water Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order.
Pots.effect: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict holy damage

Pots.name: Fire Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.
Pots.effect: Throw at enemies to inflict Fire Damage

Pots.name: Sleep Pot
Pots.description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Filled with the incantations of St. Trina. Consumes FP. Throw at enemy to release a purple, soporific haze. Like a lullaby, or a quagmire, it irresistibly draws its victims down into sleep. Sweet dreams.

Perfumes.name: Uplifting Aromatic
Perfumes.description: An of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to raise the attack power of the user and nearby allies while also reducing the damage from one incoming attack by half. This aromatic has an extremely potent morale-raising effect that makes those accustomed to it fearless in the face of death. It was this influence that made the perfumers exceptional commanders.
Perfumes.effect: Boosts ally attack power and reduces incoming damage once.

Perfumes.name: Spark Aromatic
Perfumes.description: Art of the perfumers who fought In the Shattering. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to broadly scatter sparks in a wide arc straight ahead. Though fire was prohibited to those who served the Erdtree, this rule was forgotten as the war drew ever on.
Perfumes.effect: Uses FP to broadly scatter sparks in a wide arc straight ahead

Perfumes.name: Poison Spraymist
Perfumes.description: Forbidden art of depraved perfumers. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to release a poison mist from user's mouth, causing a buildup of poison. Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
Perfumes.effect: Uses FP to release poison mist from the mouth.

Perfumes.name: Acid Spraymist
Perfumes.description: Forbidden art of depraved perfumers. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to release a poison mist from user's mouth, causing a buildup of poison. Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
Perfumes.effect: Uses FP to release acid mist from the mouth.

Perfumes.name: Bloodboil Aromatic
Perfumes.description: Forbidden art of depraved perfumers. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to enter a temporary state of fervor, raising maximum attack power and stamina while also increasing damage received. "Even upon the battlefield, do you fear being wounded? Take a good look. Your limbs are frozen stiff."
Perfumes.effect: Uses FP to enter a temporary state of fervor.

Perfumes.name: Ironjar Aromatic
Perfumes.description: Forbidden art of depraved perfumers. Craftable with a perfume bottle. Uses FP to temporarily turn body to steel, boosting poise, resistances and damage negation at the expense of mobility and vulnerability to lightning.
Perfumes.effect: Uses FP to temporarily turn wielder's body to steel.

Greases.name: Drawstring Rot Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of rotten materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump. Quickly coats armament, inflicting scarlet rot, but with a brief effect, owing to its small size.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats armament, inflicting scarlet rot, but with a brief effect, owing to its small size.

Greases.name: Drawstring Holy Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of holy resonant materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump. Quickly coats armament, inflicting holy damage, but with a brief effect, owing to its small size.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats armament, inflicting holy damage

Greases.name: Freezing Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of frozen materials.

Greases.name: Lightning Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of fulminating materials. Craftable item.

Greases.name: Soporific Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of light-purple materials. Craftable item.

Greases.name: Drawstring Blood Grease
Greases.description: Blistered solid grease made from a mixture of blood-red materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump. Quickly coats armament, inflicting blood loss, but with a brief effect, owing to its small size.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats armament, inflicting blood loss

Greases.name: Drawstring Magic Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of magically resonant materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump. Quickly coats armament, inflicting magic damage, but with a brief effect, owing to its small size.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats armament, inflicting magic damage

Greases.name: Poison Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of poison-green materials.

Greases.name: Dragonwound Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of gravels stones. Craftable item.
Greases.effect: Coats armament, granting special dragon attacks

Greases.name: Drawstring Lightning Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of fulminating materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats armament, inflicting lightning damage.

Greases.name: Rot Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of rotten materials.

Greases.name: Magic Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of magically resonant materials.

Greases.name: Blood Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of blood-red materials.

Greases.name: Shield Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of magically resonant materials. Craftable item.
Greases.effect: Boosts guarding ability and all damage negation.

Greases.name: Fire Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of incendiary materials. Craftable item. Coats armament, adding fire damage to attacks. The effect last only for a short time.

Greases.name: Drawstring Fire Grease
Greases.description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of incendiary materials. Craftable item. A smallish lump with a short string attached. Quickly coats armament, inflicting fire damage. However, the effects are only brief.
Greases.effect: Quickly coats weapon, inflicting  Fire Damage
